field.name: summary
field.value: A CompositeKey class with multiple Equals() overloads throws exception

field.name: description
field.value: If you use Resharper 3.0 to "Generate Equals and GetHashCode", you get two overloads of the Equals method. One takes the Type of the current class, the other a plain object. This causes the SemanticVerifierVisitor to throw an AmbiguousMatchException when it tries to GetMethod("Equals"). The attached patch changes the behaviour to iterate through the methods looking for Equals(object).
